Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job

Class Job

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job.DefaultWorkUnit
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job.Job
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<DefaultWorkUnit>, Iterable<JobActivity>, WorkUnit
public class Job extends DefaultWorkUnit implements Iterable<JobActivity>
This class represents a job or unit of work. If preempted, the job keeps track of all the processing time each resource spent on processing it. The processing times are termed as activities.

performed by the resources.

Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao
See Also:

    • setResourceRanges

      public boolean setResourceRanges(RangeList ranges)
      Used to configure the resource to whom this job has been assigned.
      Parameters:
      ranges - the range of processor/resource Ids
      Returns:
      true if the id has been set; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is called before setting the status of the job to WorkUnit.Status.IN_EXECUTION.

    • getResourceRanges

      public RangeList getResourceRanges()
      Gets the resources that currently processing the job.
      Returns:
      the resource who is currently working on the job; null if there are no activities yet.
